text: The 2019–20 season is Gokulam Kerala's third season since its establishment in 2017 and their third season in the I-League. Gokulam Kerala will also be involved in the Super Cup,Durand Cup, Sheikh Kamal Cup. ==Squad information== ===First-team squad=== ===other contracts=== ==Transfers and loans== ===Transfers in=== {| ===Sheikh Kamal Cup=== The tournament is being organised by Chittagong Abahoni, a club based in Chittagong, and the Bangladesh Football Federation. Gokulam are in group 'B' along with bangaladesh premiere league champions Bashundhara Kings, I League champions Chennai City FC and Malaysian club Terengganu Football Club. The tournament has started on October 19. Only the group winners and runners up will proceed to the knockout round.https://www.news18.com/amp/news/football/gokulam-kerala-fc-join-mohun- bagan-chennai-city-fc-in-sheikh-kamal-international-club-cup-2352891.html ==== Group Stage ==== ==== Semi-finals ==== ==Current technical staff== :As of 15 April 2018. {| class="wikitable" |- !
